page.title: 15HOUSING IN BURGHFIELD
page.content: The Average house in Burghfield has four bedrooms, a kitchen, a dining room and lounge. The lounge has usually a television, a record player and furniture for sitting on. The bedrooms consist of one big one, one quite big one and two small bedrooms. The big bedroom is usually for adults. The next size is normally the spare bedroom for visitors and the two small rooms would probably be for the children. The dining room in the house is joined onto the lounge or it is seperate from the lounge. The kitchen in the house can be small or large and contains a sink, units, a cooker and a fridge. The houses also have a front and back garden. The back garden is usually bigger than the front garden.
